name: IMPRESSIONISTa Renoir - Le Seine
description:
DO YOU DREAM WALKING INSIDE A PAINTING?

Transpose yourself inside Pierre-Auguste Renoir's "The Skiff" painting! Visit Argenteuil  in 1879. Enjoy the Seine river shore in a pleasant summer day.

FEATURES:

  • A virtual 3D Art gallery space.
  • Reconstructed painting in 3D with beautiful river reflections and landscapes in Impressionist style. Walk around the place, enjoy vivid colors and live brushstrokes.
  • Find painting palettes to change the environment colors.
  • Relaxing original soundtrack composed for clarinet, harp, piano and guitar.

A CONTEMPLATIVE EXPERIENCE FOR FINE ARTS LOVERS!

OUR PURPOSE IS TO SPARK INTEREST IN ART FIELD AND EDUCATION THROUGH GAMES AND IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCES.

*Gigoia Studios is very aware that digital imagery can´t compare with real painting artwork.

* The use of games belonging to Gigoia Studios are for the buyer's personal use only and can not be marketed, altered, resold, used for other purposes without prior authorization from Gigoia Studios.
